name: Aereni (High Elf)
origin: The Aereni are a subrace of the Elves that rebelled against their giant tyrants and fled Xen'drik
summary: The Aereni are ruled and protected by the Undying Court, a council of undead Elves.
After death, the Aerni join the Undying Court in immortality/undeath.
characteristics: The High Elves are experts in magic and isolationists with little interest in the outside world
prompts: Do you have ancestors in the Undying Court?
Do you seek more knowledge and power than what the Undying Court can offer?
Do you even support the Undying Court?
Are you a part of the assassin/spy House Phiarlan or House Thuranni or bear the Mark of Shadow?
